Parsing is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Build.TeamCity.ITeamCityProvider.BuildProblem(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Report a build problem to TeamCity.
member.param: A human-readable plain text describing the build problem. By default, the description appears in the build status text and in the list of build's problems. The text is limited to 4000 symbols, and will be truncated if the limit is exceeded.

A unique problem ID (optional). Different problems must have different identity, same problems - same identity, which should not change throughout builds if the same problem, for example, the same compilation error occurs. It must be a valid Java ID up to 60 characters. If omitted, the identity is calculated based on the description text.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Diagnostics.LoggingAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality related to logging.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Diagnostics.LoggingAliases.Error(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes an error message to the log using the specified format information.

example.code: Error("Hello {0}! Today is an {1:dddd}", "World", DateTime.Now);

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Diagnostics.LoggingAliases.Error(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.Diagnostics.LogAction)
member.summary: Writes an error message to the log using the specified log message action. Evaluation message only if verbosity same or more verbose.
member.param: The function called for message when logging.

example.code: Error(logAction=>logAction("Hello {0}! Today is an {1:dddd}", "World", DateTime.Now));

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Diagnostics.LoggingAliases.Error(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Object)
member.summary: Writes an error message to the log using the specified value.

example.code: Error(new {FirstName = "John", LastName="Doe"});

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Diagnostics.LoggingAliases.Error(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Writes an error message to the log using the specified string value.

example.code: Error("{string}");

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Diagnostics.LoggingAliases.Warning(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.Object[])

member.summary: Contains functionality related to text transformation.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Text.TextTransformationAliases.TransformText(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a text transformation from the provided template.
member.example:
This sample shows how to create a using the specified template.
string text = TransformText("Hello <%subject%>!") .WithToken("subject", "world") .ToString();

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Text.TextTransformationAliases.TransformText(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a text transformation from the provided template, using the specified placeholder.
member.example:
This sample shows how to create a using the specified template and placeholder.
string text = TransformText("Hello {subject}!", "{", "}") .WithToken("subject", "world") .ToString();

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Text.TextTransformationAliases.TransformTextFile(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Creates a text transformation from the provided template on disc.
member.example:
This sample shows how to create a using the specified template file with the placeholder format <%key%>.
string text = TransformTextFile("./template.txt") .WithToken("subject", "world") .ToString();

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Text.TextTransformationAliases.TransformTextFile(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a text transformation from the provided template on disc, using the specified placeholder.
member.example:
This sample shows how to create a using the specified template file and placeholder.
string text = TransformTextFile("./template.txt", "{", "}") .WithToken("subject", "world") .ToString();

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types used to interact with ILMerge.

summary.para: Contains functionality related to ILMerge.

In order to use the commands for this alias, include the following in your build.cake file to download and install from nuget.org, or specify the ToolPath within the class:
#tool "nuget:?package=ilmerge"

member.summary: Merges the specified assemblies.

example.code: var assemblyPaths = GetFiles("./**/Cake.*.dll"); ILMerge("./MergedCake.exe", "./Cake.exe", assemblyPaths);

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.Internalize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether whether types in assemblies other than the primary assembly should have their visibility modified to internal.
member.value: true if types in assemblies other than the primary assembly should have their visibility modified to internal; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.TargetKind
member.summary: Gets or sets the target kind.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.TargetPlatform
member.summary: Gets or sets the target platform.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.DelaySign
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the target assembly will be delay signed.
member.value: true if target assembly will be delay signed; otherwise, false.
member.remark: This can be set only in conjunction with the option.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.Closed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "transitive closure" of the input assemblies is computed and added to the list of input assemblies.
member.value: true if the "transitive closure" of the input assemblies is computed and added to the list of input assemblies; otherwise, false.
member.remark: An assembly is considered part of the transitive closure if it is referenced, either directly or indirectly, from one of the originally specified input assemblies and it has an external reference to one of the input assemblies, or one of the assemblies that has such a reference.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.NDebug
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a .pdb file for the output assembly is generated and merges into it any .pdb files found for input assemblies.
member.value: true if pdb file is generated for output assembly; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.CopyAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the assembly level attributes of each input assembly are copied over into the target assembly.
member.value: true if the assembly level attributes are copied to target assembly; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.AllowMultiple
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you want to allow duplicates (for those attributes whose type specifies "AllowMultiple" in their definition).
member.value: true if duplicates are allowed; otherwise, false.
member.remark: This can be set only in conjunction with the option.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.KeepFirst
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first attribute that is found is kept.
member.value: true if the first attribute that is found is kept; otherwise, false.
member.remark: This can be set only in conjunction with the option.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.XmlDocumentation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether XML documentation files are merged to produce an XML documentation file for the target assembly.
member.value: true if XML documentation files are merged; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.UseFullPublicKeyForReferences
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether external assembly references in the manifest of the target assembly will use full public keys or public key tokens.
member.value: true when full public keys should be used; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.Wildcards
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any wild cards in file names are expanded and all matching files will be used as input.
member.value: true if wildcards in file names are expanded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.ZeroPeKind
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an assembly's PeKind flag (this is the value of the field listed as .corflags in the Manifest) is zero it will be treated as if it was ILonly.
member.value: true when assembly's PeKind flag is zero; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.Union
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether types with the same name are all merged into a single type in the target assembly.
member.value: true if types with the same name are merged into a single type in the target assembly; otherwise, false.
member.remark: Cannot be specified at the same time as .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.Align
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that controls the file alignment used for the target assembly.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.AttributeFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the path and filename to an attribute assembly, an assembly that will be used to get all of the assembly-level attributes such as Culture, Version, etc.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version. When this has a non-null value, then the target assembly will be given its value as the version number of the assembly.
member.remark: The version must be a valid assembly version as defined by the attribute AssemblyVersion in the System.Reflection namespace.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.Log
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether log messages are written.
member.remark: If Log is true, but is null, then log messages are written to Console.Out.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.LogFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the file where log messages should be written to.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.KeyFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a .snk file. The target assembly will be signed with its contents and will then have a strong name.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.KeyContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the container to use when signing the target assembly.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.SearchDirectories
member.summary: Gets or sets the directories to be used to search for input assemblies.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.AllowDuplicateTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow the user to allow all public types to be renamed when they are duplicates.
member.value: true if all public types should be allowed to be renamed; otherwise false.
member.remark: Use to allow fine grain control over exactly which types are allowed to be renamed.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.ILMerge.ILMergeSettings.DuplicateTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of public types which are allowed to be renamed when duplicates exist.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types used to interact with MSBuild.

summary.para: Contains functionality related to MSBuild.
In order to use the commands for this alias, MSBuild will already have to be installed on the machine the Cake Script is being executed.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildAliases.MSBuild(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Builds the specified solution or MsBuild project file using MSBuild.
member.param: The solution or MsBuild project file to build.

example.code: MSBuild("./src/Cake.sln");

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildAliases.MSBuild(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}})
member.summary: Builds the specified solution or MsBuild project file using MSBuild.
member.param: The solution or MsBuild project file to build.
The action to invoke with the standard output.

example.code: MSBuild("./src/Cake.sln", output => foreach (var line in output) outputBuilder.AppendLine(line));

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildAliases.MSBuild(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Action{Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings})
member.summary: Builds the specified solution or MsBuild project file using MSBuild.
member.param: The solution or MsBuild project file to build.

example.code: MSBuild("./src/Cake.sln", configurator => configurator.SetConfiguration("Debug") .SetVerbosity(Verbosity.Minimal) .UseToolVersion(MSBuildToolVersion.VS2015) .SetMSBuildPlatform(MSBuildPlatform.x86) .SetPlatformTarget(PlatformTarget.MSIL));

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildAliases.MSBuild(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Action{Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings},System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}})
member.summary: Builds the specified solution or MsBuild project file using MSBuild.
member.param: The solution or MsBuild project file to build.
The action to invoke with the standard output.

example.code: var outputBuilder = new StringBuilder(); MSBuild("./src/Cake.sln", configurator => configurator.SetConfiguration("Debug") .SetVerbosity(Verbosity.Minimal) .UseToolVersion(MSBuildToolVersion.VS2015) .SetMSBuildPlatform(MSBuildPlatform.x86) .SetPlatformTarget(PlatformTarget.MSIL), output => foreach (var line in output) outputBuilder.AppendLine(line));

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildAliases.MSBuild(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings)
member.summary: Builds the specified solution using MSBuild.
member.param: The solution or MsBuild project file to build.

member.summary: Builds the specified solution or MsBuild project file using MSBuild.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ShowTimestamp. Show the timestamp as a prefix to any message.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildFileLogger.ShowEventId
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ShowEventId. Show the event ID for each started event, finished event, and message.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildFileLogger.Verbosity
member.summary: Gets or sets Verbosity. Override the /verbosity setting for this logger. Specify the following verbosity levels: q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], v[erbose] (detailed), and diag[nostic].

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildFileLogger.LogFile
member.summary: Gets or sets LogFile. The path to the log file into which the build log is written. An empty string will use msbuild.log.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildFileLogger.AppendToLogFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the build log is appended to the log file or overwrites it. When true, the build log is appended to the log file.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum CPU count. If this value is zero, MSBuild will use as many processes as there are available CPUs to build the project. If not set MSBuild compile projects in this solution one at a time.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.NodeReuse
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not node reuse is used. When youre doing multiple builds in a row, this helps reduce your total build time, by avoiding the start up costs of each MSBuild child node.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.DetailedSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not detailed summary is created. Shows detailed information at the end of the build about the configurations built and how they were scheduled to nodes.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.NoConsoleLogger
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not information is logged to the console. Disable the default console logger and do not log events to the console.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.NoLogo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show copyright information at the start of the program.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value of all the version numbers embedded in the build output.

member.summary: Gets or sets the base version number embedded in the build output.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.VersionSuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the pre-release label of the version number embedded in the build output.

member.summary: Gets or sets the file version number embedded in the build output.

member.summary: Gets or sets the assembly version number embedded in the build output.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.InformationalVersion

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.PackageReleaseNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets the release notes of the NuGet package generated.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.ContinuousIntegrationBuild
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to normalize stored file paths used when producing deterministic builds.
member.remarks: For more information see https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/producing-packages-with-source-link/#deterministic-builds.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.NoImplicitTarget
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether implicit target should be passed to MSBuild. If set to true, no targets will be specified. If set to false, and no targets specified, Build target will be passed by default.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.Verbosity
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of information to display in the build log. Each logger displays events based on the verbosity level that you set for that logger.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.IncludeSymbols
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a symbol package should be created.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.SymbolPackageFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol package format.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.Loggers
member.summary: Gets the loggers.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.FileLoggers
member.summary: Gets the file loggers.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.BinaryLogger
member.summary: Gets or sets the binary logging options.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.WarningsAsError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether warnings should be treated as errors. Treats all warnings as errors unless has specific codes specified.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.WarningsAsErrorCodes
member.summary: Gets the warning codes to treat as errors. If any specified will implicitly be treated as true.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.WarningsAsMessageCodes
member.summary: Gets the warning codes to NOT treat as errors.
member.remarks: Only available MSBuild version 15 (VS2017) and newer.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.Restore
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Restore target should be run before any other targets. This setting will pass the /restore option down to MSBuild. Use this setting when working with the new csproj format.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.RestoreLockedMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to lock the package dependency graph while restoring, using the packages.lock.json file. This setting is available with at least Visual Studio 2017 version 15.9 and above or NET SDK version 2.1.500 and above.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.ConsoleLoggerParameters
member.summary: Gets the console logger parameters.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings.AllowPreviewVersion
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether tools from a preview edition of Visual Studio should be used.
If set to true, MSBuildTools from a Preview edition (e.g. Visual Studio 2022 Preview) will be considered to be used.

member.summary: Adds a custom logger.

The class implementing the logger. Should match the format [PartialOrFullNamespace.]LoggerClassName. If the assembly contains only one logger, class does not need to be specified.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettingsExtensions.AddFileLogger(Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings)
member.summary: Adds a file logger with all the default settings. Each file logger will be declared in the order added. The first file logger will match up to the /fl parameter. The next nine (max) file loggers will match up to the /fl1 through /fl9 respectively.
member.returns: The same instance so that multiple calls can be chained.

member.summary: Adds a file logger. Each file logger will be declared in the order added. The first file logger will match up to the /fl parameter. The next nine (max) file loggers will match up to the /fl1 through /fl9 respectively.
member.param: Parameters to be passed to the logger.
member.returns: The same instance so that multiple calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettingsExtensions.EnableBinaryLogger(Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings)

member.summary: Sets whether or not to lock the package dependency graph while restoring, using the packages.lock.json file. This setting is available with atleast Visual Studio 2017 version 15.9 and above or NET SDK version 2.1.500 and above.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types used to interact with MSTest.

summary.para: Contains functionality related to running MSTest unit tests.

In order to use the commands for this alias, MSTest will need to be installed on the machine where the Cake script is being executed. This is typically achieved by having either Visual Studio installed, or by using the Microsoft Build Tools, for example, for 2015.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestAliases.MSTest(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.GlobPattern)
member.summary: Runs all MSTest unit tests in the assemblies matching the specified pattern.

example.code: MSTest("./Tests/*.UnitTests.dll");

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestAliases.MSTest(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.GlobPattern,Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings)
member.summary: Runs all MSTest unit tests in the assemblies matching the specified pattern.

example.code: MSTest("./Tests/*.UnitTests.dll", new MSTestSettings() { NoIsolation = false });

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestAliases.MSTest(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Cake.Core.IO.FilePath})
member.summary: Runs all MSTest unit tests in the specified assemblies.

example.code: var paths = new List<FilePath>() { "./assemblydir1", "./assemblydir2" }; MSTest(paths);

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestAliases.MSTest(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Cake.Core.IO.FilePath},Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings)
member.summary: Runs all MSTest unit tests in the specified assemblies.

example.code: var paths = new List<FilePath>() { "./assemblydir1", "./assemblydir2" }; MSTest(paths, new MSTestSettings() { NoIsolation = false });

member.summary: Gets the name of the tool.

member.summary: Gets the possible names of the tool executable.

member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings.NoIsolation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to run tests within the MSTest process. This choice improves test run speed but increases risk to the MSTest.exe process. Defaults to true.
member.value: true if running without isolation; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the test category filter string to pass to MSTest.exe flag /testcategory.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings.ResultsFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the filepath for a named resulting test file. MSTest.exe flag /resultsfile.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings.TestSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the test settings file to pass to MSTest.exe flag /testsettings.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.MSTest.MSTestSettings.AllowPreviewVersion
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether tools from a preview edition of Visual Studio should be used.
If set to true, MSTest from a Preview edition (e.g. Visual Studio 2022 Preview) will be considered to be used.

member.summary: Installs NuGet packages using the specified package configuration file and settings.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory in which packages will be installed. If none is specified, the current directory will be used.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the package to install. If none specified, the latest will be used.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.ExcludeVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to exclude the version number from the package folder.
member.value: true if to exclude the version number from the package folder; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.Prerelease
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow installation of prerelease packages. This flag is not required when restoring packages by installing from packages.config.
member.value: true to allow installation of prerelease packages; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.RequireConsent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to check if package install consent is granted before installing a package.
member.value: true if to check if package install consent is granted before installing a package; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.SolutionDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the solution directory path for package restore.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of packages sources to use for this command.
member.value: The list of packages sources to use for this command.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.NoCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to use the machine cache as the first package source.
member.value: true to not use the machine cache as the first package source; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.NoHttpCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not use the HTTP cache and contact all configured package sources for live information.
member.value: true to not use the HTTP cache and contact package sources for live information; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.DisableParallelProcessing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable parallel processing of packages for this command. Disable parallel processing of packages for this command.
member.value: true to disable parallel processing of packages for this command; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.Verbosity
member.summary: Gets or sets the output verbosity.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.ConfigFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the NuGet configuration file. If not specified, the file %AppData%\NuGet\NuGet.config is used as the configuration file.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.FallbackSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of packages sources to use as fallbacks for this command. This setting requires NuGet V3 or later.
member.value: The list of packages sources to use as fallbacks for this command.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Install.NuGetInstallSettings.NonInteractive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not NuGet suppresses prompts for user input or confirmations.
member.remarks: This setting is passed by NuGet.exe to any extensions such as authorization providers.
member.value: false to allow NuGet to show prompts for user input or confirmations; otherwise, true.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContent.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the file or files to include. The path is relative to the NuSpec file unless an absolute path is specified. The wildcard character - * - is allowed. Using a double wildcard - ** implies a recursive directory search.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContent.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative path to the directory within the package where the source files will be placed.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContent.Exclude
member.summary: Gets or sets the file or files to exclude. This is usually combined with a wildcard value in the src attribute. The exclude attribute can contain a semi-colon delimited list of files or a file pattern. Using a double wildcard - ** - implies a recursive exclude pattern.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContentFile
member.summary: Specifies the package's content to identify the exact files that are included in the package.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContentFile.Include
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the file or files to include. The wildcard character - * - is allowed. Using a double wildcard - ** implies a recursive directory search.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContentFile.Exclude
member.summary: Gets or sets files or file patterns to exclude from src location. The wildcard character - * - is allowed. Using a double wildcard - ** implies a recursive directory search.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContentFile.BuildAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the build action to assign to the content item for MSBuild, e.g. Compile. Defaults to Compile.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContentFile.CopyToOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to copy content items to the build (or publish) output folder. Defaults to false.
member.value: true if content items should be copied to the output folder; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecContentFile.Flatten
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to copy content items to a single folder in the build output or to preserve the folder structure in the package. This flag only works when copyToOutput flag is set to true. Defaults to false.
member.value: true if content items should be copied to a single folder; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecDependency
member.summary: Represents a NuGet nuspec dependency.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecDependency.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the dependency's package ID.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecDependency.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the dependency's version.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecDependency.Include
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of include/exclude tags indicating of the dependency to include in the final package. The default value is all.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecDependency.Exclude
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of include/exclude tags indicating of the dependency to exclude in the final package. The default value is build,analyzers which can be over-written.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecDependency.TargetFramework
member.summary: Gets or sets the target framework for the dependency.

member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified assembly name.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuSpecFrameworkAssembly.TargetFramework
member.summary: Gets or sets the target framework to which this reference applies. If omitted, indicates that the reference applies to all frameworks.

member.summary: This namespace contain types used to push NuGet packages.

member.summary: Pushes a NuGet package to a NuGet server and publishes it.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Push.NuGetPushSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Push.NuGetPushSettings.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the server URL. When using NuGet pre 3.4.2, this value is optional and nuget.org is used if omitted (unless DefaultPushSource config value is set in the NuGet config file. When using NuGet 3.4.2 (or more recent), this value is mandatory. Starting with NuGet 2.5, if NuGet.exe identifies a UNC/folder source, it will perform the file copy to the source.
member.remarks: For your convenience, here is the URL for some of the most popular public NuGet servers: - NuGet Gallery: https://nuget.org/api/v2/package - MyGet: https://www.myget.org/F/<your_username>/api/v2/package.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Push.NuGetPushSettings.ApiKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the API key for the server.
member.value: The API key for the server.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Push.NuGetPushSettings.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for pushing to a server. Defaults to 300 seconds (5 minutes).
member.value: The timeout for pushing to a server.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Push.NuGetPushSettings.Verbosity
member.summary: Gets or sets the verbosity.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Push.NuGetPushSettings.ConfigFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the NuGet configuration file.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Push.NuGetPushSettings.SkipDuplicate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip a package and continue with the next package in the push, if any when a package with the same version already exists.
member.value: true if skipping duplicates; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether package restore consent is granted before installing a package.

member.summary: Gets or sets the packages folder.

member.summary: Gets or sets a list of packages sources to use for this command.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to use the machine cache as the first package source.
member.value: true to not use the machine cache as the first package source; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Restore.NuGetRestoreSettings.DisableParallelProcessing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to disable parallel processing of packages for this command.
member.value: true to disable parallel processing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Restore.NuGetRestoreSettings.Verbosity
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of output details.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Restore.NuGetRestoreSettings.ConfigFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the NuGet configuration file. If not specified, the file %AppData%\NuGet\NuGet.config is used as the configuration file.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Restore.NuGetRestoreSettings.FallbackSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of packages sources to use as fallbacks for this command. This setting requires NuGet V3 or later.
member.value: The list of packages sources to use as fallbacks for this command.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Restore.NuGetRestoreSettings.MSBuildVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of MSBuild to be used with this command. By default the MSBuild in your path is picked, otherwise it defaults to the highest installed version of MSBuild. This setting requires NuGet V3 or later.
member.value: The version of MSBuild to be used with this command.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Restore.NuGetRestoreSettings.MSBuildPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of MSBuild to use. This setting takes precedence over -MSBuildVersion and requires NuGet V4 or later.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Restore.NuGetRestoreSettings.NonInteractive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not NuGet suppresses prompts for user input or confirmations.
member.remarks: This setting is passed by NuGet.exe to any extensions such as authorization providers.
member.value: false to allow NuGet to show prompts for user input or confirmations; otherwise, true.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.NuGetAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality for working with NuGet.
member.para: Since Cake requires NuGet to be available very early in the build pipeline, we recommend that NuGet is made available via the Cake Bootstrapper.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.NuGetAliases.NuGetPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuGetPackSettings)
member.summary: Creates a NuGet package using the specified nuspec or project file.
member.param: The nuspec or project file path.

example.code:
var nuGetPackSettings = new NuGetPackSettings { Id = "TestNuGet", Version = "0.0.0.1", Title = "The tile of the package", Authors = new[] {"John Doe"}, Owners = new[] {"Contoso"}, Description = "The description of the package", Summary = "Excellent summary of what the package does", ProjectUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/"), IconUrl = new Uri("http://cdn.rawgit.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/master/icons/testNuGet.png"), LicenseUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/blob/master/LICENSE.md"), Copyright = "Some company 2015", ReleaseNotes = new [] {"Bug fixes", "Issue fixes", "Typos"}, Tags = new [] {"Cake", "Script", "Build"}, RequireLicenseAcceptance= false, Symbols = false, NoPackageAnalysis = true, Files = new [] { new NuSpecContent {Source = "bin/TestNuGet.dll", Target = "bin"}, }, BasePath = "./src/TestNuGet/bin/release", OutputDirectory = "./NuGet" };
NuGetPack("./nuspec/TestNuGet.nuspec", nuGetPackSettings);

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.NuGetAliases.NuGetPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Cake.Core.IO.FilePath},Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuGetPackSettings)
member.summary: Creates NuGet packages using the specified nuspec or project files.
member.param: The nuspec or project file paths.

example.code:
var nuGetPackSettings = new NuGetPackSettings { Id = "TestNuGet", Version = "0.0.0.1", Title = "The tile of the package", Authors = new[] {"John Doe"}, Owners = new[] {"Contoso"}, Description = "The description of the package", Summary = "Excellent summary of what the package does", ProjectUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/"), IconUrl = new Uri("http://cdn.rawgit.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/master/icons/testNuGet.png"), LicenseUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/blob/master/LICENSE.md"), Copyright = "Some company 2015", ReleaseNotes = new [] {"Bug fixes", "Issue fixes", "Typos"}, Tags = new [] {"Cake", "Script", "Build"}, RequireLicenseAcceptance= false, Symbols = false, NoPackageAnalysis = true, Files = new [] { new NuSpecContent {Source = "bin/TestNuGet.dll", Target = "bin"}, }, BasePath = "./src/TestNuGet/bin/release", OutputDirectory = "./NuGet" };
var nuspecFiles = GetFiles("./**/*.nuspec"); NuGetPack(nuspecFiles, nuGetPackSettings);

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.NuGetAliases.NuGetPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Common.Tools.NuGet.Pack.NuGetPackSettings)
member.summary: Creates a NuGet package using the specified settings.

example.code:
var nuGetPackSettings = new NuGetPackSettings { Id = "TestNuGet", Version = "0.0.0.1", Title = "The tile of the package", Authors = new[] {"John Doe"}, Owners = new[] {"Contoso"}, Description = "The description of the package", Summary = "Excellent summary of what the package does", ProjectUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/"), IconUrl = new Uri("http://cdn.rawgit.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/master/icons/testNuGet.png"), LicenseUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestNuGet/blob/master/LICENSE.md"), Copyright = "Some company 2015", ReleaseNotes = new [] {"Bug fixes", "Issue fixes", "Typos"}, Tags = new [] {"Cake", "Script", "Build"}, RequireLicenseAcceptance= false, Symbols = false, NoPackageAnalysis = true, Files = new [] { new NuSpecContent {Source = "bin/TestNuGet.dll", Target = "bin"}, }, BasePath = "./src/TestNuGet/bin/release", OutputDirectory = "./NuGet" };
NuGetPack(nuGetPackSettings);

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types used to interact with NUnit.

summary.para: Contains functionality related to running NUnit v2 and v3 unit tests.

In order to use the commands for this alias, include the following in your build.cake file to download and install from nuget.org, or specify the ToolPath within the class:
#tool "nuget:?package=NUnit.ConsoleRunner"

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Aliases.NUnit3(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.GlobPattern)
member.summary: Runs all NUnit unit tests in the assemblies matching the specified pattern.

example.code: NUnit3("./src/**/bin/Release/*.Tests.dll");

member.summary: Runs all NUnit unit tests in the specified assemblies, using the specified settings.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3AppDomainUsage
member.summary: The /domain option controls of the creation of AppDomains for running tests.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3AppDomainUsage.Default
member.summary: Create a separate AppDomain for each assembly if more than one is listed on the command line, otherwise creates a single AppDomain.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3AppDomainUsage.None
member.summary: No AppDomain is created - the tests are run in the primary domain. This normally requires copying the NUnit assemblies into the same directory as your tests.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3AppDomainUsage.Single
member.summary: A single test AppDomain is created for all test assemblies This is how NUnit worked prior to version 2.4.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3AppDomainUsage.Multiple
member.summary: An AppDomain is created for each assembly specified on the command line.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Labels
member.summary: Represents the possible values for the Labels option.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Labels.Off
member.summary: Does not output labels. This is the default.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Labels.On
member.summary: Outputs labels for tests that are run.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Labels.All
member.summary: Outputs labels for all tests.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Labels.Before
member.summary: Outputs labels at the start of every test.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Labels.After
member.summary: Outputs labels at the end of every test.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3ProcessOption
member.summary: Represents the various ways NUnit loads tests in processes.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3ProcessOption.Multiple
member.summary: A separate process is created for each test assembly. This is the default.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3ProcessOption.Separate
member.summary: One separate process is created to run all of the test assemblies.

member.name: F:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3ProcessOption.InProcess
member.summary: All the tests are run in the nunit-console process.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Result
member.summary: Contains information for the results that should be exported.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Result.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the XML result file.
member.value: The name of the XML result file. Defaults to TestResult.xml.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Result.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the format that the results should be in. must be set to have any effect. Specify nunit2 to output the results in NUnit 2 xml format. nunit3 may be specified for NUnit 3 format, however this is the default. Additional formats may be supported in the future, check the NUnit documentation.
member.value: The format of the result file. Defaults to nunit3.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Result.Transform
member.summary: Gets or sets the file name of an XSL transform that will be applied to the results.
member.value: The name of an XSLT file that will be applied to the results.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Runs the tests in the specified assemblies, using the specified settings.

member.summary: Gets the name of the tool.

member.summary: Gets the possible names of the tool executable.

member.summary: Customized NUnit 3 exit code handling. Throws on non-zero exit code.

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings.Test
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of tests to run or explore.
member.value: A comma-separated list of test names.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings.TestList
member.summary: Gets or sets a file containing the tests to run.
member.value: File path containing a list of tests to run, one per line.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings.Where
member.summary: Gets or sets the test selection expression indicating what tests will be run.
member.value: The --where option is intended to extend or replace the earlier --test, --include and --exclude options by use of a selection expression describing exactly which tests to use. Examples of usage are: --where:cat==Data --where "method =~ /DataTest*/ && cat = Slow" See https://github.com/nunit/docs/wiki/Test-Selection-Language.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the default timeout to be used for test cases in this run. If any test exceeds the timeout value, it is cancelled and reported as an error.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings.Seed
member.summary: Gets or sets the random seed used to generate test cases.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings.Workers
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of worker threads to be used in running tests.If not specified, defaults to 2 or the number of processors, whichever is greater.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnit3Settings.StopOnError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether execution of the test run should terminate immediately on the first test failure or error.
member.value: true if execution of the test run should terminate immediately on the first test failure or error; otherwise, false.

#tool "nuget:?package=NUnit.Runners&version=2.6.4"

member.summary: Gets or sets the release notes for the new release.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to Ignore Existing release flag.

member.summary: Gets or sets environment to automatically deploy to, e.g., Production.

member.summary: Gets or sets multiple environments to automatically deploy to, e.g., Production, Staging, etc.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.ShowProgress
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether progress of the deployment should be followed. (Sets --waitfordeployment and --norawlog to true.)

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force downloading of already installed packages. Default false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.WaitForDeployment
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to wait synchronously for deployment to finish.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.DeploymentTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets maximum time (timespan format) that the console session will wait for the deployment to finish (default 00:10:00). This will not stop the deployment. Requires WaitForDeployment parameter set.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.CancelOnTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to cancel the deployment if the deployment timeout is reached(default false).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.DeploymentChecksLeepCycle
member.summary: Gets or sets how much time should elapse between deployment status checks(default 00:00:10).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.GuidedFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use Guided Failure mode. If not specified, will use default setting from environment.

member.summary: Gets or sets list of machines names to target in the deployed environment.If not specified all machines in the environment will be considered.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.Force
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a project is configured to skip packages with already-installed versions, override this setting to force re-deployment (flag, default false).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.SkipSteps
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of steps to be skipped. Takes step names.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.NoRawLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print the raw log of failed tasks or not.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.RawLogFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a file where to redirect the raw log of failed tasks.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.Variables
member.summary: Gets or sets values for any prompted variables.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.CreateReleaseSettings.DeployAt
member.summary: Gets or sets time at which deployment should start (scheduled deployment), specified as any valid DateTimeOffset format, and assuming the time zone is the current local time zone.

member.summary: Gets or sets a tenant tags used to match tenants that the deployment will be performed for; specify this argument multiple times to add multiple tenant tags.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether overwrite the variable snapshot for the release by re-importing the variables from the project.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether progress of the deployment should be followed. (Sets --waitfordeployment and --norawlog to true.)

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force downloading of already installed packages. Default false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.WaitForDeployment
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to wait synchronously for deployment to finish.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.DeploymentTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets maximum time (timespan format) that the console session will wait for the deployment to finish (default 00:10:00). This will not stop the deployment. Requires WaitForDeployment parameter set.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.CancelOnTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to cancel the deployment if the deployment timeout is reached(default false).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.DeploymentChecksLeepCycle
member.summary: Gets or sets how much time should elapse between deployment status checks(default 00:00:10).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.GuidedFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use Guided Failure mode. If not specified, will use default setting from environment.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.SpecificMachines
member.summary: Gets or sets list of machines names to target in the deployed environment.If not specified all machines in the environment will be considered.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.Force
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a project is configured to skip packages with already-installed versions, override this setting to force re-deployment (flag, default false).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.SkipSteps
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of steps to be skipped. Takes step names.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.NoRawLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print the raw log of failed tasks or not.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.RawLogFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a file where to redirect the raw log of failed tasks.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.Variables
member.summary: Gets or sets values for any prompted variables.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.DeployAt
member.summary: Gets or sets time at which deployment should start (scheduled deployment), specified as any valid DateTimeOffset format, and assuming the time zone is the current local time zone.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.OctopusDeploy.OctopusDeployPromoteReleaseSettings.Tenant
member.summary: Gets or sets a tenant the deployment will be performed for; specify this argument multiple times to add multiple tenants or use `*` wildcard to deploy to tenants able to deploy.

member.summary: Gets or sets a tenant tags used to match tenants that the deployment will be performed for; specify this argument multiple times to add multiple tenant tags.

member.summary: Does not create backup before migration

member.summary: Creates log backup before migration

summary.para: Contains functionality related to RoundhousE.

In order to use the commands for this alias, include the following in your build.cake file to download and install from nuget.org, or specify the ToolPath within the class:
#tool "nuget:?package=roundhouse"

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.PermissionsFolderName

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.AfterMigrationFolderName
member.summary: Gets or sets the folder name for 'afterMig' scripts.
member.value: The name of the folder for scripts to run before migration and outside of a transaction.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.SchemaName
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema name to use instead of [RoundhousE].
member.value: The schema where RH stores its tables.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.Environment
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment for RH to be scoped.
member.value: This allows RH to be environment aware and only run scripts that are in a particular environment based on the naming of the script. LOCAL.something**.ENV.**sql would only be run in the LOCAL environment.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.Restore
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether perform a restore.
member.value: This instructs RH to do a restore (with the parameter) of a database before running migration scripts.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.RestoreFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the restore file path.
member.value: File path of back when Restore is set to true.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.CreateDatabaseCustomScript
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom database creation script.
member.value: This instructs RH to use this script for creating a database instead of the default based on the SQLType.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the output path.
member.value: Path to where migration artifacts are stored.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.WarnOnOneTimeScriptChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to warn when previously run scripts have changed.
member.value: Instructs RH to execute changed one time scripts (DDL/DML in 'Up'/) that have previously been run against the database instead of failing. A warning is logged for each one time scripts that is rerun.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.Silent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep RH silent.
member.value: Tells RH not to ask for any input when it runs.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.DatabaseType
member.summary: Gets or sets database type.
member.value: Database Type (fully qualified class name implementing [roundhouse.sql.Database, roundhouse]).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.Drop
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to drop the DB.
member.value: This instructs RH to remove a database and not run migration scripts.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.WithTransaction
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use transactions.
member.value: This instructs RH to run inside of a transaction.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.RecoveryMode
member.summary: Gets or sets SQL Server recovery mode.
member.value: This sets the recovery model for SQL Server during migration. (NoChange, Simple, Full).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.DryRun
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to perform a dry run.
member.value: This instructs RH to log what would have run, but not to actually run anything against the database. Use this option if you are trying to figure out what RH is going to do.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.DoNotCreateDatabase
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a database if it does not exist.
member.value: This instructs RH to not create a database if it does not exists. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.DisableOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable output of backup, items ran, permissions dumps, etc.
member.value: Disable output of backups, items ran, permissions dumps, etc. Log files are kept. Useful for example in CI environment. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.Baseline
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create an insert for its recording tables, but not run anything.
member.value: This instructs RH to create an insert for its recording tables, but not to actually run anything against the database. Use this option if you already have scripts that have been run through other means. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.Debug
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to write debug messages.
member.value: This instructs RH to write out all messages. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.RunAllAnyTimeScripts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to execute any time scripts.
member.value: This instructs RH to run any time scripts every time it is run. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.DisableTokenReplacement
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to perform token replacement.
member.value: This instructs RH to not perform token replacement {{somename}}. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Roundhouse.RoundhouseSettings.SearchAllSubdirectoriesInsteadOfTraverse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to search all subdirectories.
member.value: Each Migration folder's subdirectories are traversed by default. This option pulls back scripts from the main directory and all subdirectories at once. Defaults to false.

In order to use the commands for this alias, include the following in your build.cake file to download and install from nuget.org, or specify the ToolPath within the appropriate settings class:
#tool "nuget:?package=WiX"

member.name: T:Cake.Common.Tools.XBuild.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types used to interact with XBuild.

summary.para: Contains functionality related to XBuild.
In order to use the commands for this alias, XBuild (which is part of Mono) will already have to be installed on the machine the Cake Script is being executed.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.XBuild.XBuildAliases.XBuild(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.ShadowCopy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tests should be run as a shadow copy. Default value is true.
member.value: true if tests should be run as a shadow copy; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the output directory.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.NUnitReport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an NUnit style XML report should be generated.
member.value: true if an NUnit Style XML report should be generated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.JUnitReport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an JUnit style XML report should be generated.
member.value: true if an JUnit Style XML report should be generated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.XmlReport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an XML report should be generated.
member.value: true if an XML report should be generated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.XmlReportV1
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an xUnit.net v1 style XML report should be generated.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.HtmlReport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an HTML report should be generated.
member.value: true if an HTML report should be generated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.ReportName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name that should be used for the HTML and XML reports.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.NoAppDomain
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to not use app domains to run test code.
member.value: true to not use app domains to run test code; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.Parallelism
member.summary: Gets or sets the parallelism option. Corresponds to the -parallel command line switch.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.UseX86
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to run tests in using x86 test runner.
member.value: true to run tests with the x86 test runner; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.MaxThreads
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum thread count for collection parallelization.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.TraitsToInclude
member.summary: Gets the traits to include.
member.remarks: Only run tests with matching name/value traits. If more than one is specified, it acts as an OR operation.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.TraitsToExclude
member.summary: Gets the traits to exclude.
member.remarks: Do not run tests with matching name/value traits. If more than one is specified, it acts as an AND operation.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.NamespacesToInclude
member.summary: Gets the namespaces to include.
member.remarks: Runs all methods in a given namespace (i.e., 'MyNamespace.MySubNamespace') If more than one is specified, it acts as an OR operation.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.ClassesToInclude
member.summary: Gets the class names to include.
member.remarks: Runs all methods in a given test class (should be fully specified; i.e., 'MyNamespace.MyClass') If more than one is specified, it acts as an OR operation.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.MethodsToInclude
member.summary: Gets the test methods to include.
member.remarks: Runs the given test methods (should be fully specified; i.e., 'MyNamespace.MyClass.MyTestMethod') If more than one is specified, it acts as an OR operation.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.XUnit.XUnit2Settings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.para: Contains functionality for working with Chocolatey.
In order to use the commands for this alias, Chocolatey will require to be installed on the machine where the build script is being run. See this page for details on how Chocolatey can be installed.

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.ChocolateyAliases.ChocolateyPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Pack.ChocolateyPackSettings)
member.summary: Creates a Chocolatey package using the specified Nuspec file.

example.code:
var chocolateyPackSettings = new ChocolateyPackSettings { Id = "TestChocolatey", Title = "The tile of the package", Version = "0.0.0.1", Authors = new[] {"John Doe"}, Owners = new[] {"Contoso"}, Summary = "Excellent summary of what the package does", Description = "The description of the package", ProjectUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), PackageSourceUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), ProjectSourceUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), DocsUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), MailingListUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), BugTrackerUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), Tags = new [] {"Cake", "Script", "Build"}, Copyright = "Some company 2015", LicenseUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/blob/master/LICENSE.md"), RequireLicenseAcceptance= false, IconUrl = new Uri("http://cdn.rawgit.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/master/icons/testchocolatey.png"), ReleaseNotes = new [] {"Bug fixes", "Issue fixes", "Typos"}, Files = new [] { new ChocolateyNuSpecContent {Source = "bin/TestChocolatey.dll", Target = "bin"}, }, Debug = false, Verbose = false, Force = false, Noop = false, LimitOutput = false, ExecutionTimeout = 13, CacheLocation = @"C:\temp", AllowUnofficial = false };
ChocolateyPack("./nuspec/TestChocolatey.nuspec", chocolateyPackSettings);

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.ChocolateyAliases.ChocolateyPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Cake.Core.IO.FilePath},Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Pack.ChocolateyPackSettings)
member.summary: Creates Chocolatey packages using the specified Nuspec files.

example.code:
var chocolateyPackSettings = new ChocolateyPackSettings { Id = "TestChocolatey", Title = "The tile of the package", Version = "0.0.0.1", Authors = new[] {"John Doe"}, Owners = new[] {"Contoso"}, Summary = "Excellent summary of what the package does", Description = "The description of the package", ProjectUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), PackageSourceUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), ProjectSourceUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), DocsUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), MailingListUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), BugTrackerUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), Tags = new [] {"Cake", "Script", "Build"}, Copyright = "Some company 2015", LicenseUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/blob/master/LICENSE.md"), RequireLicenseAcceptance= false, IconUrl = new Uri("http://cdn.rawgit.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/master/icons/testchocolatey.png"), ReleaseNotes = new [] {"Bug fixes", "Issue fixes", "Typos"}, Files = new [] { new ChocolateyNuSpecContent {Source = "bin/TestChocolatey.dll", Target = "bin"}, }, Debug = false, Verbose = false, Force = false, Noop = false, LimitOutput = false, ExecutionTimeout = 13, CacheLocation = @"C:\temp", AllowUnofficial = false };
var nuspecFiles = GetFiles("./**/*.nuspec"); ChocolateyPack(nuspecFiles, chocolateyPackSettings);

var chocolateyPackSettings = new ChocolateyPackSettings { Id = "TestChocolatey", Title = "The tile of the package", Version = "0.0.0.1", Authors = new[] {"John Doe"}, Owners = new[] {"Contoso"}, Summary = "Excellent summary of what the package does", Description = "The description of the package", ProjectUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), PackageSourceUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), ProjectSourceUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), DocsUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), MailingListUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), BugTrackerUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/"), Tags = new [] {"Cake", "Script", "Build"}, Copyright = "Some company 2015", LicenseUrl = new Uri("https://github.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/blob/master/LICENSE.md"), RequireLicenseAcceptance= false, IconUrl = new Uri("http://cdn.rawgit.com/SomeUser/TestChocolatey/master/icons/testchocolatey.png"), ReleaseNotes = new [] {"Bug fixes", "Issue fixes", "Typos"}, Files = new [] { new ChocolateyNuSpecContent {Source = "bin/TestChocolatey.dll", Target = "bin"}, }, Debug = false, Verbose = false, Force = false, Noop = false, LimitOutput = false, ExecutionTimeout = 13, CacheLocation = @"C:\temp", AllowUnofficial = false };

member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source to find the package(s) to download. Defaults to default feeds.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the package to download. If none specified, the latest will be used.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.Prerelease
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow downloading of prerelease packages.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.User
member.summary: Gets or sets the user for authenticated feeds.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for authenticated feeds.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.Certificate
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a PFX certificate for use with x509 authenticated feeds.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.CertificatePassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for the .

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory for the downloaded Chocolatey packages. By default the current working directory is used.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.IgnoreDependencies
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore dependencies. Requires Chocolatey licensed edition.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.Installed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to download all currently installed Chocolatey packages.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.IgnoreUnfound
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore unfound packages if downloading more than one at a time.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.DisableRepositoryOptimizations
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use optimizations for reducing bandwidth when communicating with repositories.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.Internalize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all external resources should be downloaded and the package be recompiled to use the local resources instead. Requires Chocolatey business edition.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.ResourcesLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the location for downloaded resource when is set. null or if downloaded resources should be embedded in the package. Can be a file share or an internal URL location. When it is a file share, it will attempt to download to that location. When it is an internal url, it will download locally and give further instructions where it should be uploaded to match package edits. By default resources are embedded in the package. Requires Chocolatey business edition.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.DownloadLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the location where resources should be downloaded to when is set. null or if should be used. By default is used. Requires Chocolatey business edition.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.InternalizeAllUrls
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all URLs, not only from known helpers, should be internalized. Requires Chocolatey business edition (Licensed version 1.11.1+).

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.AppendUseOriginalLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the -useOriginalLocation parameter will be passed to any Install-ChocolateyPackage call in the package and avoiding downloading of resources when is set. Overrides the global internalizeAppendUseOriginalLocation feature. By default set to false. Requires Chocolatey business edition and Chocolatey v0.10.1 or newer.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.SkipDownloadCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip the package download cache.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.UseDownloadCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the package download cache.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.SkipVirusCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether skip the virus checking for a package.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.VirusCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force virus checking for a package.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.Chocolatey.Download.ChocolateyDownloadSettings.VirusPositivesMinimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum allowed number of virus positives.

summary.para: Contains functionality related to DotCover.

In order to use the commands for this alias, include the following in your build.cake file to download and install from nuget.org, or specify the ToolPath within the appropriate settings class:
#tool "nuget:?package=JetBrains.dotCover.CommandLineTools"

member.summary: Gets or sets the target runtime.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.Build.DotNetBuildSettings.Framework
member.summary: Gets or sets the specific framework to compile.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.Build.DotNetBuildSettings.VersionSuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that defines what `*` should be replaced with in version field in project.json.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.Build.DotNetBuildSettings.NoIncremental
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to mark the build as unsafe for incrementality. This turns off incremental compilation and forces a clean rebuild of the project dependency graph.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.Build.DotNetBuildSettings.NoDependencies
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore project to project references and only build the root project.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.Build.DotNetBuildSettings.NoRestore
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to not do implicit NuGet package restore. This makes build faster, but requires restore to be done before build is executed.
member.remarks: Requires .NET Core 2.x or newer.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.Build.DotNetBuildSettings.NoLogo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the startup banner or the copyright message.
member.remarks: Available since .NET Core 3.0 SDK.

member.name: P:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.Build.DotNetBuildSettings.Sources
member.summary: Gets or sets the specified NuGet package sources to use during the build.
member.remarks: Requires .NET Core 2.x or newer.

member.summary: Gets or sets additional arguments to be passed to MSBuild.

example.code: DotNetTest("./test/Project.Tests/Project.Tests.csproj");
example.para: You could also specify a task that runs multiple test projects.
If your test project is using project.json, the project parameter should just be the directory path.
example.code: DotNetTest("./test/Project.Tests/");

member.name: M:Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.DotNetAliases.DotNetVSTest(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.GlobPattern)
member.summary: Test one or more projects specified by a path or glob pattern using the VS Test host runner.
member.param: A path to the test file or glob for one or more test files.

example.para: Specify the path to the .csproj file in the test project.
example.code: DotNetVSTest("./test/Project.Tests/bin/Release/netcoreapp2.1/Project.Tests.dll");
example.para: You could also specify a glob pattern to run multiple test projects.
example.code: DotNetVSTest("./**/bin/Release/netcoreapp2.1/*.Tests.dll");
